settings.title: Settings
settings.aboutText1: This app was entirely designed and built by
settings.aboutText2: It is constantly being improved. Feel free to share your suggestions for improvements!

newShow.title: New Light Show
newShow.name: Name
newShow.model3Hint: While waiting for Model Y support, you can use this model: the elements and lights are virtually identical.

timeline.loadingHint:
This may take 2 minutes
Do not quit the app
timeline.durationTooLong: This file is {{duration}} long. The maximum duration allowed by Tesla is {{max}}.

parts.selectHint: Select a part on the Tesla
parts.trunkDanceHint: Trunk must be open before dancing
parts.closureMaxReached: Maximum number of actions reached for this show

export.page1Intro: To import your LightShow into your Tesla, follow these tips:
export.page1Note:
You can only have one custom LightShow in your Tesla.
To have multiple, you need multiple USB drives!
export.page1Tip: Our Teslas can be finicky. To increase your chances of it working the first time:
export.page3Intro: Create a folder at the root of the drive, name it:
export.page3Warning1: Do not name it differently, no spaces and respect upper/lowercase.
export.page3FileIntro:
Place the MP3 file and the FSEQ file in this folder.
They must have
export.page3Warning2: Do not place anything else in the folder.
export.page3Tip: In Windows, if you want to see extensions to be sure: in a folder, click on
export.page4Intro: Plug your drive into your Tesla.
export.page4TipMid:
and not a USB port dedicated to charging.

Most of the time, on post-2021 models, the USB data port is in the
export.page4OutroEnd: : you will see "lightshow" directly selected as the show to launch. That means everything is good!
export.loadInvalidFile: Invalid file. Please select a .json file exported from Light Studio.

share.title: Share Light Show
share.description: You can export your events to a file so that a friend who has Light Studio can also load your Light Show.
share.noEvents: You don't have any events on the timeline yet. Place at least one event to be able to share.

load.title: Load a Light Show
load.description: You can load a Light Show created by a friend who has Light Studio. The events will be added to your timeline.
load.noTrack: You must first load a music track on this Light Show before you can import events.
load.warning: Warning: current events will be replaced by those from the imported file.
